first.title: Spot Trade
first.description: Crypto-to-crypto trading, such as selling USDT for BTC.

second.title: Margin Trade
second.description: Borrowing from other users to amplify the profit and loss.

third.title: Leveraged Tokens
third.description: Enjoy up to 5X leveraged trading with Cryptozen Leveraged ETF Tokens

fourth.title: Push Transaction
fourth.description: Push Transactions / Transfer an asset at a given price to another account using the Push function, a peer-to-peer sell/buy operation.

fifth.title: Flash Swap
fifth.description: Swap one currency with another in one click.

sixth.title: Perpetual
sixth.description: A crypto derivative. It differs from the traditional futures mainly because it has no settlement date.

seventh.title: Delivery
seventh.description: Future contracts that are settled at expiration time. No funding payment is received or paid.

eighth.title: Options
eighth.description: European options group with put and call options of different strike prices and exercise dates.

ninth.title: CBBC
ninth.description: Callable bull/bear contract, a structured product. High leverage, easy purchase, low fee.

tenth.title: Garanti
tenth.description: If you are bullish on the price movement of the underlying asset,buy a call warrant;if you are bearish,buy a put warrant

first.title: HODL & Earn
first.description: A one stop investment center with a variety of products.

second.title: Structured Products
second.description: Pre-packed products that include assets linked to interest and derivatives.

third.title: Auto Investment
third.description: One-click investment, flexible portfolio, redeemable and changeable anytime.

fourth.title: Crypto Lending
fourth.description: A investment to lend your crypto at specified interest rate and loan term to get earnings.

sixth.title: Margin Borrowing
sixth.description: Borrowing to amplify your buying power with your own holdings as margin.

seventh.title: Liquidity Mining
seventh.description: Earn income from fees by providing Dual-Assets liquidity to the market.

eighth.title: Lending & Single-Asset Vault
eighth.description: Provide Single-Asset liquidity to earn income. Deposit or withdraw anytime.

tenth.title: Slot Auctions
tenth.description: Participate in parachain auctions & receive rewards.
